com.nwollmann.jgame

Class AutomaticGameEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nwollmann.jgame.AutomaticGameEvent

  • public class AutomaticGameEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    An event which can be registered with the GameManager to be called repeatedly in the future.
    Author:
    Nicholas Wollmann

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AutomaticGameEvent() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute()
      Executes the event.
      int getDelay()
      Returns the minimum delay between executions of this event in milliseconds.
      long getNextExecute()
      Gets the system time when this event will next be invoked.
      void setNextExecute(long nextExecute)
      Sets the system time when this event will next be invoked.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AutomaticGameEvent

        public AutomaticGameEvent()

    • Method Detail

      • setNextExecute

        public final void setNextExecute(long nextExecute)
        Sets the system time when this event will next be invoked. Intended for use by the GameManager class.
        Parameters:
        nextExecute - Milliseconds of next execute

      • getNextExecute

        public final long getNextExecute()
        Gets the system time when this event will next be invoked. Intended for use by the GameManager class.
        Returns:
        Milliseconds of next execute

      • getDelay

        public int getDelay()
        Returns the minimum delay between executions of this event in milliseconds. Intended for use by the GameManager class. Any child classes should override this method.
        Returns:
        Delay in milliseconds between executes

      • execute

        public void execute()
        Executes the event. Intended for use by the GameManager class. Child classes should override this method.
